def: A professor of canon law; one skilled in the knowledge andpractice of ecclesiastical law. South.
To assume as a bearing; as, he charges three roses or; to addto or represent on; as, he charges his shield with three roses or.
A genus of slender herbs, usually with square stems, whorledleaves, and small white flowers. Our Lady's bedstraw, which hasyellow flowers, is Galium verum.-- White bedstraw is G. mollugo.
One who fights with his fists; esp., a professional prizefighter; a boxer.

The cutting off or suppression of a vowel or syllable, for thesake of meter or euphony; esp., in poetry, the dropping of a finalvowel standing before an initial vowel in the following word, whenthe two words are drawn together.
Pertaining to, or resembling, pearl; pearly.
Of or pertaining to a serpent. [Obs.]
